value.description: Kenneth Knight, 58, passed away on Monday, May 11, 2020, in Decatur, Ga. He was a graduate of Parker High School in Birmingham, Al. After graduation, Kenneth enlisted in the Navy, retiring after ...

value.name: Obituary: Dennis Wayne Knight
value.description: Dennis Wayne Knight, 64, passed away May 19, 2021 at his home in Oakland. He was born March 6, 1957 in Waterville, the son of Kenneth A. and Virginia A. (French) Knight. He graduated from Messalonskee High School in 1976.
